General.Name: Business intelligence of Oriental Nations Corp Ltd
General.Description: Business-intelligence of Oriental Nations Corporation Ltd. provides big data and cloud platform solutions in China and internationally. The company offers internet collection and big data governance platform; BONC a web graphical interface visual editor; BI build tool; interactive exploration tool for data extraction, data filtering, and data aggregation; GIS platform; enterprise container cloud; enterprise application development platform; industrial internet cloud enterprise productivity management; ARES mobile development platform; and scientific data cloud solutions. It serves communications, finance, government, urban, agriculture, medical care, and retail industries. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Dongfang Guoxin Building, Building 1, Beijing, China, 100102
